55  1.666667 0.8333333
343 7.083333 5.4166667
319 7.500000 5.0000000
> 
av.sd.iter <- apply(M.COUNT,1,function(x) sqrt((NRUN-1)/NRUN*var(x)))
> av.sd.iter
 [1] 0.44395946 0.43863424 0.45376205 0.42708313 0.43863424 0.42083251 0.40000000 0.34698703 0.44899889 0.37563280 0.36660606 0.36660606
[13] 0.27129320 0.31288976 0.35707142 0.34698703 0.35707142 0.30000000 0.30000000 0.30000000 0.32496154 0.40000000 0.32496154 0.23748684
[25] 0.21794495 0.30000000 0.27129320 0.32496154 0.19595918 0.33630343 0.21794495 0.21794495 0.19595918 0.23748684 0.23748684 0.27129320

> 
> count2 <- c(1,2,3,4,5,6,16,26,36,46)
> av.sd.iter[count2]
 [1] 0.4439595 0.4386342 0.4537621 0.4270831 0.4386342 0.4208325 0.3469870 0.3000000 0.2712932 0.2179449
> round(av.sd.iter[count2],digits = 4)
 [1] 0.4440 0.4386 0.4538 0.4271 0.4386 0.4208 0.3470 0.3000 0.2713 0.2179
> av.hit.iter[count2]
